title: Emerald Radiance Vanki - Traditional Armlet with a Contemporary Twist
materials: brilliant-cut CZ Diamonds. Features a fine Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster and antique appeal.
features: This exquisite vanki showcases intricate filigree work reminiscent of traditional South Indian designs. A square-cut emerald takes center stage, surrounded by a halo of sparkling CZ diamonds meticulously set in a floral motif. The openwork design provides a delicate and airy feel, blending classic aesthetics with modern sensibilities. The cuff is comfortable and sturdy.
colors: Lustrous yellow gold contrasted by the vibrant green of the emerald and the dazzling white of the CZ diamonds. A classic and elegant color palette.
occasions: or other special occasions where you want to make a statement. Its versatile design also makes it suitable for upscale parties and formal events.
description: This Vanki blends traditional South Indian artistry with a contemporary design, making it a timeless piece. The high-quality emerald, the intricate filigree, and the sparkling CZ diamonds ensure both beauty and lasting value. Its Hyderabadi polish provides a unique sheen, and the comfortable design ensures ease of wear. It's a testament to skilled craftsmanship and a precious heirloom to be cherished for generations.
